report.title: UKBMS Year Plot Index Report Japan Test
report.description: UKBMS specific, for use with the Year by Year plot form: gives year index values using ukbms_year_index_values data - Test Version
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM ukbms_year_index_values yiv JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON yiv.taxa_taxon_list_id = cttl.id LEFT JOIN ( /* Use non-cache table for ordering, as common name specific sort orders are not copied to cache table. Japan has specific sort orders. */ SELECT cttl_common.taxon_meaning_id as taxon_meaning_id, string_agg(cttl_common.taxon, ',' ORDER BY cttl_common.id) as combined FROM cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl_common JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl_common on ttl_common.id = cttl_common.id WHERE cttl_common.language_iso = '#language_iso#' AND cttl_common.preferred = false AND cttl_common.taxon_list_id = (#taxon_list_id#) GROUP BY cttl_common.taxon_meaning_id) common ON common.taxon_meaning_id = cttl.taxon_meaning_id #joins# WHERE yiv.location_id = #location_id#

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location

param.name: language_iso
param.description: Three letter ISO code for language.
